attributes.review: Why does it take so long to download! Took days, after it downloaded my phone got hacked, the app tracks your location!! And almost got robbed by trump supporters, really bad quality, made my phone lag for weeks had to get my whole phone fixed! i do not recommend!
attributes.title: Do not recommend

attributes.review: Just horrible quality bad service and it took for ever to download and didn’t even work just straight up a waste of time and it hacked my phone and deleted all my hard art work and my job got me fired worst app on here should just get removed immediately.💩💩💩💩💩💩🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡 Donald is a clown 🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡 make me sick disgusted🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢
attributes.title: By far worst app ever

attributes.review: This app is a direct reflection of what an incompetent waste of life Donald Trump is. It has been a national disgrace to have him as the head of the United States. He not only doesn’t know how to run a country, but his app is also trash! Probably should’ve seen it coming when it was kicking it with Epstein years back 😗.
attributes.title: slow, ugly, and unimportant sums it up

attributes.review: For starters this app has no features but too up a terabyte of storage. When you open the app there is nothing but an ugly hateful banner. The app asks for microphone and camera access and access to your photos, social security number, and credit card number. No security at all
attributes.title: Stole data and sold it to Russia

attributes.review: it took weeks to download, and a hacker collected my information and got their dog to go number 2 on my phone! the worse part is that.. the dog looked very similar to donald j trump, cheeto skin, spray tan line, “)” shaped spine.. i honestly think our president took over my phone and came to my house to go number two on my phone... take this DOWN :((
attributes.title: awful😿😿

attributes.review: Once I opened the app I was attacked by some weird and random language that I could not read. I threw my phone away and got a new one😡. I couldn’t sleep because I was trying to see what the words meant little did I know I attached a demon to me and now it doesn’t wanna leave. He do get annoying but I feed him. Any tips?
attributes.title: Haunted

attributes.review: Immediately after the app was downloaded my phone began to process everything significantly slower, offline apps as well, apps that don’t require WiFi! Ridiculous! I deleted for fear of further damaging my phone, I should speak with someone to buy me a replacement iPhone! This was not cheap 🤬🤬🤬
attributes.title: Terrible!

attributes.review: man this is just a really bad app. The formatting is terrible, the bugs are off the charts, the guy who’s picture they’re using makes me want to throw up... the whole thing just looks like it was made by an orange baby given too much freedom with his crayons. 0/10, would never recommend to anybody in my life ever :(
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review:
When Rihanna said shine bright like a diamond ✨🥰💖she wasn’t talking about you🧚🌸💫please stop trying 💅😘
This is a horrible app! Took 6 hours to install and then had some sketchy terms and conditions👀 it stoped me from looking for the gummy bear album 😭 and threatened to cut the trë🍃⚠️ and it’s soooooo ✨bad✨ I hate the colour orange 🍊 anyways...

Stan Bernie for clear skin 😌💅
And settle for Biden 😔🤟
attributes.title: Gotta keep an eye out for Selener -👄👁

attributes.review: I never really write reviews, but I’ve also never had this bad of an experience till now. The app froze constantly, and would kick me out. When it wouldn’t kick me out of the app, I was bombarded with so many ads, I never even got to use the app. Theres only one word to describe this app, and it’s terrible.
attributes.title: Terrible
